title: adhesiontext
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921071901/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921071901/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tools) : [Text Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921071901/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Text%20Tools): adhesiontext**

[**adhesiontext**](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921071901/http:/www.adhesiontext.com/) is a dynamic text tool created by [Miguel Sousa](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921071901/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Miguel%20Sousa), which generates a dummy text paragraph with a limited set of characters.
author: Miguel Sousa
